website_summaries.verdict: The sleek but affordable Asus UX430U packs an Intel Core i7 and a sharp 14-inch full HD display, making it a powerful ultraportable that won't break the bank.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible rubbing fan noise
customer_reviews.text: Received today and has a terrible fan noise. I also hear some electrical noise as others mentioned but the fan noise is really loud. It seems that the fan is rubbing against some internal part as when I press certain keys it even slows down.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Few things that you should know before you purchase this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I`m just using this laptop for the last 2 days and already en-counting few issues like , fan is very noisy when starts at max power. The back of the laptop become extremely hot when you trying to do multiple tasks , even hotter when the charger is plugged. When i try to access C:/ drive it froze for 20 sec and after that allow me to explore the drive. Kind of disappointed about this laptop which have great configuration for this amount of money cost, i`m still thinking to return or not , if problems persist definitely i will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Fast and trouble-free!
customer_reviews.text: I went with the ZenBook because it was the only affordable system that offered 16 GB of RAM and a 526 GB SSD. After 2 months of use I have few complaints. Fast and trouble-free. Minimal bloatware. My only criticisms are a power button that is overly easy to activate (would prefer having to hold it down for a second) and a fairly dim display even on full brightness. Would recommend, if it fits your budget. UPDATE....... Still happy a year later. System is stable trouble-free.
customer_reviews.author: Boreal

customer_reviews.title: Defect thats in every Zenbook UX430
customer_reviews.text: Asus pushes this product knowingly that it has a defect called “coil whine”. Basically its a noise that radiates whenever the laptop is in use. This defect isn’t just from one bad laptop, its a design defect thats across all Zenbook UX430 models, meaning no matter what, yours will have a defect too (if you decide to purchase this). Id stay away from this model. Simply google “coil whine asus ux430” to become informed. Keep in mind, this doesnt happen in any other current gen. laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coil whine and chassis flex and bending dampen the experience for what is a fantastic Ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the portability, the display, battery life and performance of this ultrabook. But my concerns about Asus' quality control remain: the computer has a noticeable coil whine emanating from the top left corner of the base (near where the escape key is), and the notebook has a serious chassis flex problem. The unit I have got delivered with a keyboard that is somewhat (by atleast 1 mm) recessed into the chassis near the D-F-G-V keys owing to the aluminum chassis having bent. The coil whine problem is not that serious on my unit, but to pay a $1,000 to have a notebook delivered with a bent chassis has been disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Hashim

customer_reviews.title: Great computer!
customer_reviews.text: So I don’t ever write reviews, but feel as though I should. I was on the fence about purchasing this due to the “coil wind” reviews. I took a chance and couldn’t be happier. If you place your ear against the computer and free yourself from even the slightest ambient noise, then yeah... perhaps you MIGHT hear the computer function. To me, 100% normal. I have yet to hear any fan noises either. This computer is super fast and very much worth the purchase. Any negative reviews is simply someone being way too critical. I whole heartily recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable and portable laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Asus. I was Toshiba lover and also worked with Dell and Lenovo provided by my company. I do basic tasks in this laptop (Office, Google Docs, working online) and works great. I found this LT very reliable and easy to carry everywhere. There are things like the number of ports available, but I was aware when I choose it. Not missing Toshiba at all.
customer_reviews.author: JoseSando

customer_reviews.title: Light and fast for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Deciding to wait for i7-8550U processor was a good decision. It finally has 4 cores. It really makes the difference. Now I have a device which is small and light but its performance is comparable to desktop machines. If we use the full potential however the battery drains very fast and it can get hot - but this is something I was expecting. Device is perfect if you need high performance from time to time. If you just do web browsing, 8-9h on battery is achievable. Aluminium body looks and feels very solid. Screen is also very good. It has warranty which actually works in Poland where I live. It is not that common when buying Laptops abroad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Laptop works great, but has coil whine
customer_reviews.text: The Laptop works great, but has coil whine, and is my second laptop, the first one came with a terrible fan noise, Asus, you shoul care more about your quality controls
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Mac Book Pro... if you want to spend the money buy 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: So far this laptop has completely met my expectations. Extremely light yet feels rigid enough, loads all my 3D design software fast and nice. Graphics could be faster... but not for this price tag! I love Windows 10, and particularly the fact it is not Windows 8... The only but I find it that when plugged it generates that weird electric field around the keyboard and behind the screen that you feel when you pass your finger or hand. It is strange, I guess it is because there is no ground on the Power Supply?
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: Coil Whine Still an Issue
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product 06/2018 after seeing reviewers claiming the coil whine problem was resolved on later models. It's still present. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: DSW

customer_reviews.title: Good thin and light laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: The laptop looks nice, the screen is really good, and it's thin and light as well. I bought the i7 16 GB 512 SSD model which is quite powerful in terms of performance. The only downside is (the reason for 4 stars) the fan noise. The fan noise is really irritating. However, I've been using this laptop for month and a half now and I got used to that noise. Except for that, this laptop is really good. I'm pretty sure you can't find a thin and light laptop with these specs for this price anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Supun Abeysinghe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is splendid. Lightweight, fast, nice screen. I would've liked more ports but I just bought a USB C hub with 4 USB A 3.0 ports. It does has a little coil whine (I believe it's the SSD) but it happens only on full stress and it is not that often, I can hardly ever notice it if it's still happening. I'm really happy with the product, ASUS really knows how to create an attractive and useful computer.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: A quick laptop
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is well constructed. The fingerprint access is great. The screen is good and nice size. Storage is good and quick. Cons: The speakers are on the bottom of the laptop and get muffled when laptop not on flat surface, such as a pillow. The last ASUS I had had a touch screen for the same price. This one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful with excellent display and speakers. Not great keyboard, coil whine
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Durable metal construction Very light and easy to carry Very powerful for the price Excellent matte display (no touchscreen) Excellent speakers Cons: The keyboard could be better It produces some electrical noise (coil whine)
customer_reviews.author: Giorgos

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader is a joke
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for 3 months. The fingerprint reader never worked very well and it’s very frustrating. Now it’s failing all the times. The fans kick in as soon as you watch a YouTube or vlc video. There is a coil whine. Doesn’t bother me but beware. Already has a burned pixel right in the middle of the screen basically where the ASUS logo show up on boot.
customer_reviews.author: agenteo

customer_reviews.title: Fast and light laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Light, thin, matte screen, and blazing fast. Was able to dual boot with Ubuntu 18.04 with relative ease. I guess I got lucky and did not have the coil whine issue; laptop is virtually silent unless running a heavy process. The keyboard and trackpad work well too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I chose this as the most powerful processor / memory combination for laptops of this size. I am very pleased with my purchase. It is lightweight, comfortable, and the case is very well made. Screen quality is perfect. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Charles Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Battery failure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop in April 2018. The battery is not working anymore. Took to an authorized third party service center it seems the battery is integrated and there is a connection issue and now I need to change the mother board.... Spent a good amount to purchase it but currently only works when power is connected. No battery :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet minimal expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this laptop for about a month but have only used it twice. I noticed a loud whine sound an upon seeing reviews clearly this is common. And was told this was 10 hour battery but when you hover over the battery icon after a full charge it tops out at 4 hours. Incredible hard to be a college student and need to charge every four hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J Standish

customer_reviews.title: PC Bluetooth stopped working after a few weeks. Need ...
customer_reviews.text: PC Bluetooth stopped working after a few weeks. Need to send it back for repair. This is the second Asus ZenBook that breaks for me. Stay away from it. Yes it is covered under warranty but sending a PC for repair is not practical. What do you do while they fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Sammy S

customer_reviews.title: It works great to view streaming video
customer_reviews.text: I connect this to my tv via hdmi and use a wireless keyboard and mouse while at home. It works great to view streaming video. It is very slim and will be easy to travel with. It is great for everything i do except play games on high settings.
customer_reviews.author: chad help

customer_reviews.title: and it handles everything I've thrown at it easily. Plus its size and weight make it very ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding computer. Lightweight, fast, and very capable. I use it mainly for general purpose school work and software development, and it handles everything I've thrown at it easily. Plus its size and weight make it very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Patterson

customer_reviews.title: excellent computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: excellent computer for the price, absolutlely no fan noise as other reviewers have said, will update if any problem comes up
customer_reviews.author: R. Duarte

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Super fast. Lightroom runs awesome, some games even work well on it. I like the design. It's light. And yes it's a bit noisy at times but I've gotten used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, terrible customer service by eGoodies.
customer_reviews.text: The key board buttons started acting up after two weeks and got worse by the 4th week. As soon as we started the return process, they said it is outside the 30 days return policy and they can not accept it and we have to send it to Asus to get it fixed. The fan also made a constant noise.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop but be aware of drivers
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, baterry is great sounds good but duwl wif driver has issues as I need to use an external wifi device. Isent to ASUS support but they just said that need to change Mother board and just left, awful service
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Slim, lightweight, powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Zenbook. It's been my workhorse for a couple years now. The size, thinness, and performance are all perfect for my needs in IT. The laptop travels well and the battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: 15" laptop in a 14" form factor
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fast 8th gen i7 15" laptop in a 14" form factor.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received 2 days back, Noted slight vibration while charging. lets watch it further for any other problems. lack of quality checks..!!!!
customer_reviews.author: coolguy

customer_reviews.title: Fan noise
customer_reviews.text: It has this bad fan noise all the time. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: amazing machine. super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: amazing machine. super lightweight, solid, great spec. bought a second one with the better graphics card (UX430UN) for a tiny bit more money and infinitely better gaming performance.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: I've read blogs about the fan and yes it comes on for a short time when hot but its not too annoying. I like this laptop a lot
customer_reviews.text: Its not a mac-book in terms of display definition and components but then its less than half the price, 16GB ram & 8th gen i7 windows 10, fast portable and light. I've read blogs about the fan and yes it comes on for a short time when hot but its not too annoying. I like this laptop a lot, no regrets and strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme de Moor

customer_reviews.title: cool and snappy
customer_reviews.text: Dead silent, cool and snappy. I use this computer for coding and works really well, although the screen could be a bit brighter I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: My Berkeley student loves this laptop. does everything he needs and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: There's a small electronic humming that is annoying me. Everything else about it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small laptop with 14" view screen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer!!!! I have a 7th generation and this 8th is better because the screen is bigger !
customer_reviews.author: Freedom of health choices advocate

customer_reviews.title: Zenbook
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter. She loves Asus product; however, the Zen book took it to a next level. She loves her laptop and its features. Easy to use and light as feather.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: Got Amazon refurbished. Not worth $1000. Bad quality. Maybe would be better if new
customer_reviews.author: qyushzhy

customer_reviews.title: The computer at all looks very beautiful and great
customer_reviews.text: The computer at all looks very beautiful and great. However, the first date I got it the noise of the fan was very terrible, I returned it immediately. I can imagine in the future it will get worse and worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Asus Zenbook is pack with tons of features and programs which is easy to understand and control
customer_reviews.text: I received my laptop a few day ago, and i'm enjoying every moment of it. Asus Zenbook is pack with tons of features and programs which is easy to understand and control. I have to say, I'm a completely satisfied customer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Very Thin and High-end Specs.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's something fast, high end specs, super thin and lightweight. What made it special to me is how satisfying the screen is because it's wade and kinda big. All that in less than 3 pounds weight.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman Almutairi

customer_reviews.title: everything is nice the laptop is very well crafted
customer_reviews.text: I just receive my Asus, everything is nice the laptop is very well crafted, slim and light. I would give it 5/5 if it didnt lack one of the (Rubber feet) on the back of the laptop. This kind of things should not happen on any new product, less on a 1000$ product. I expect you to send me some spare rubber feets at least.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Guirola

customer_reviews.title: Good price Strong technical features Great battery life CONS
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Slim and really portable. Good price Strong technical features Great battery life CONS: Won't wake up from sleep. I needed to reset the laptop several times! It is really annoying!!! Loud Poor fingerprint sensor
customer_reviews.author: Folio

customer_reviews.title: The build quality is excellent, the battery is great but it could be ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is incredibly portable and fast. As an student of Systems Engineering, I really need a laptop fast enough to do my job without trouble, not for gaming. The build quality is excellent, the battery is great but it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Piero Alberto Bardelli Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop for Home Office
customer_reviews.text: Very fast processor, is compact, and works great. Very happy with this laptop. This is my 3rd ASUS and they never disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and superfast.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my new superfast machine! Asus at its best.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Stocking

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received it with a broken light....the screen wouldn't work. Had to return and order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Ebenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Coil whine on mine
customer_reviews.text: I love the laptop but am seriously annoyed at the cool whine... this meets if not exceeds my expectations but I wish the coil whine issue would be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: John R Davis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The speaker malfunctioned in 6 months. I returned it for repair and paid shipping. They don't even send a label or box. Poor customer satisfaction and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for College
customer_reviews.text: Used for College. She loves how lightweight it is to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For this price I have nothing to complain about. ...
customer_reviews.text: For this price I have nothing to complain about. It's doing everything well so far. Low price. High specs. That's all about it.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop .. very light and portable .. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and performance
customer_reviews.text: Powerhouse laptop for an affordable price! Amazing sound and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Sahan K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What I did not like was that it is not a touch screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its performance is quite impressive and has a good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in December and I have not had any issues so far. Its performance is quite impressive and has a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgito

customer_reviews.title: This laptop has been a great buy. It is very light
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has been a great buy. It is very light, fast and neat. I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Brown

customer_reviews.title: it makes an annoying noise, it is not the fan but an ...
customer_reviews.text: it makes an annoying noise, it is not the fan but an electric sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It appears the the keyboard does not work. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alenya Felts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop for a super low price Light weight, powerful, just perfect
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: No case
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a new asus laptop one a year I have a stack of them Everyone has come with a case I use Not this one Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: streetglide18

customer_reviews.title: After just about a month of use of this product ...
customer_reviews.text: After just about a month of use of this product, I was unable to use Microsoft Office. A trial version was installed, and subsequent to that I was unable to do anything using office. What inconvenience! Had I known that I wouldn't have purchased this computer. Most of what I do requires use of Office so this was beyond disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I got this laptop, today but the price just ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop,today but the price just came down!
customer_reviews.author: VIC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The computer didn't work. After a lot of trouble, returned it after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All the people complaining about cpu noise are being awfully fussy. My wife loves her new laptop
customer_reviews.author: Simo

customer_reviews.title: The computer is just fine right now
customer_reviews.text: The computer is just fine right now. However it's cheaper than I bought. I bought it two weeks ago. And it's getting cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ZHANGYINGHUI

product_meta.title: ASUS ZenBook 14 Thin and Light Laptop - 14” Full HD WideView, 8th gen Core i7-8550U Processor, 16GB DDR3, 512GB SSD, Backlit KB, Fingerprint Reader, Grey, Windows 10 Home - UX430UA-DH74
product_meta.description: Style:Core i7-8550U | NanoEdgeZenbook has always been a different kind of ultraportable laptop, but the elegant and sophisticated zenbook UX430 is a new kind of different: we've crafted a travel-friendly 13-inch zenbook with a work-friendly 14-inch display with nano-edge bezel design! For the first time ever, you don't have to make the difficult choice between portability and screen size - The Incredible zenbook UX430 achieves the impossible by delivering both! Its slim and lightweight design, iconic zenbook styling, and high-performance components make zenbook UX430 the take-anywhere powerhouse you won't want to leave behind, wherever you go. Take more with you, in less space!. *The actual transfer speed of USB 3.0, 3.1 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment.
feature_bullets: 14-Inch wide-view Full-HD nano-edge bezel display in 13.3" chassis with Windows 10 Pre-installed
Latest 8th generation Intel i7-8550U 1.8 GHz Processor (Turbo to 4.0 GHz)
Fast storage and memory featuring 512GB SSD with 16GB DDR3 RAM
Extensive connectivity with micro HDMI/USB Type C, 802.11a/c WiFi, and SD Card Reader
Sleek and light weight 2.75 lbs aluminum body for comfortable portability
Built-in fingerprint reader with one-touch login via Windows Hello feature

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars171 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
